content:
this is a single endpoint from an open api spec document
it has been minified by removing unnecessary kvps
additionally common terms have been abbreviated  operationId: GetSites path: https://gateway.stackpath.com/delivery/v1/stacks/{stack_id}/sites content: params
name stackid
desc a stack id or slug
in path
required true
schema
type str
name pagerequestfirst
desc the number of items desired
in query
required false
schema
type str
name pagerequestafter
desc the cursor value after which data will be returned
in query
required false
schema
type str
name pagerequestfilter
desc sqlstyle constraint filters
in query
required false
schema
type str
name pagerequestsortby
desc sort the response by the given field
in query
required false
schema
type str
sum get all sites
responses
200
deliverygetsitesresponse
type obj
props
paginationpageinfo
type obj
props
totalcount
type str
desc the total number of items in the dataset
haspreviouspage
type bool
format bool
desc whether or not a previous page of data exists
hasnextpage
type bool
format bool
desc whether or not another page of data is available
startcursor
type str
desc the cursor for the first item in the set of data returned
endcursor
type str
desc the cursor for the last item in the set of data returned
desc information about a paginated response

this is modeled after the graphql relay spec to support both cursor based pagination and traditional offset based pagination
results
type arr
deliverysite
type obj
props
id
type str
desc a sites unique identifier
stackid
type str
desc the id of the stack to which a site belongs
label
type str
desc the sites name
status
type str
desc the sites status
features
type arr
deliverysitefeature
type str
default unknown
desc a site feature

a sites feature determines how stackpath delivers content to incoming https requests

  unknown stackpath is unable to determine a sites feature
  cdn a site has cdn caching
  waf a site has waf protection
  api a site has apispecific protections
  serverlessedgeengine a site can serve edgeengine serverless scripts
desc a sites features

site features control how its content is delivered to end users
createdat
type str
format datetime
desc the date a site was created
updatedat
type str
format datetime
desc the date a site was last updated
apiurls
type str
desc a list of api urls which receive different processing through the waf than website requests
monitoring
type bool
format bool
desc whether or not a sites waf service is in a monitor state

sites in waf monitoring mode accept incoming requests and log but take no action on policy and rule violations
desc the requested sites
desc the response from a request to retrieve a stacks sites
title: 27_Sites_GetSites_162.json
